body: Use CMake recursively  a CMakeLists.txt file in each subdirectory    Utilize GoogleTest's CMake  by moving submodule    Move all host code to just `host` no subdirectories   Move native code to `native`   Rename libps to libpsnative  since we have libpshost too    Rename host_cmdline to powershell   Install powershell to monad linux bin   Install libpshost and libpsnative to monad linux lib   Use CMake add_test   to generate a make test target   Git subtree split to remove unnecessary nesting  src and ext src repos   VSO create date - 10/27/2015 9:20:00     VSO closed date - 10/27/2015 9:24:00
title: Restructure monad-native
